tool_description: Live and historical precious metal (Gold, Silver, Palladium, Platinum, ...) and foreign exchange prices in over 160+ currencies.
title: MetalpriceAPI

api_list.name: historical
api_list.description: This endpoint will return historical exchange rate data. Use format YYYY-MM-DD for the base url.

api_list.name: change
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to request the change (percentage) of one of more currencies, relative to a base currency with a specific time-frame (optional).

api_list.name: live
api_list.description: This endpoint will return real-time exchange rate data

api_list.name: convert
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to convert any amount from one currency to another.

api_list.name: timeframe
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to get historical rates for a specified time period (max range: 365 days).

api_list.name: symbols
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to get the list of the most up-to-date supported symbols.
